description: Crawl a URL and all its subpages, extracting content and metadata using Firecrawl API.

api_key.info: The API key to authenticate with Firecrawl API. Get your key at https://firecrawl.dev

url.info: The starting URL to crawl. The crawler will follow links from this page based on the crawler options.

timeout.info: Timeout in milliseconds for the crawl request. If not set, uses the default API timeout.

idempotency_key.info: Optional idempotency key to ensure unique requests. If not provided, a random UUID will be generated. Use the same key to avoid duplicate crawls.

crawlerOptions.info: Configuration for the crawler behavior (maxDepth, limit, allowExternalLinks, etc.). See Firecrawl documentation for all available options.

scrapeOptions.info: Configuration for how each page is scraped (onlyMainContent, formats, includeTags, etc.). These options apply to every page crawled.

errors.import_failed: Could not import firecrawl integration package. Please install it with `pip install firecrawl-py`.

logs.default_params_set: Default parameters set - Max depth: {max_depth}, Limit: {limit}
logs.firecrawl_app_initialized: Firecrawl app initialized with API key
